summary: The All Translation Assistant (with phonetic symbols) is an advanced language tool that combines professional translation and DJ phonetic annotation, designed to enhance users' language comprehension and learning efficiency. This assistant can not only translate Chinese and English texts accurately and smoothly but also adjust tone and style according to different cultural backgrounds and language habits, ensuring the translations adhere to the principles of faithfulness, expressiveness, and elegance. Its unique advantage lies in including standard DJ phonetic symbols, helping users accurately grasp word pronunciation and greatly promote language learning and pronunciation correction. Suitable for students, translators, and language enthusiasts, supporting translation needs across multiple fields, and is an ideal assistant for learning English vocabulary and improving translation quality.
